availability.p: All research and writing of Civil War Governors of Kentucky Digital Documentary Edition annotations was undertaken by project staff, volunteers, and interns. Each record contains citations to relevant primary and secondary source material. All annotations are copyright Kentucky Historical Society, and should be referenced as such in any published work.

seriesStmt.title: Civil War Governors of Kentucky Digital Documentary Edition

person.persName: Charles N. Stringfellow (Carroll County, Kentucky, carpenter)

body.p: Carroll County, Kentucky, carpenter. Carroll County, Kentucky, native. Son of William Stringfellow and Elizabeth Atchison Stringfellow. Married to Eliza Belle Monroe Stringfellow in December 1847. Father of William Stringfellow, Gertrude Stringfellow, and Harry Stringfellow. Carpenter in Carroll County in 1860.

ab.bibl: Eighth Manuscript Census of the United States (1860), Population Schedules, Kentucky, Carroll County, Carrollton District 2, 26. W. H. Perrin, J. H. Battle, and G. C. Kniffin, Kentucky: A History of the State, 7th ed. (Louisville and Chicago: F. A. Battey and Company, 1887), p. 893. Find A Grave, "Charles N. Stringfellow (May 11, 1820-1905)," Memorial #22834372, http://www.findagrave.com/memorial/22834372 (accessed March 21, 2018).
